title: CS Competency Enhancement: Computer-Based Language Education Materials Using Systematic Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational language learning knowledge
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design process of computer-based educational materials for language learning by applying the ADDIE model
Based on instructional design principles, one can develop language education scenarios and assessment tools
Through learner analysis, one can create interactive learning materials suitable for large-scale online environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
